message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.AI, cs.DC

This paper discusses the current state of ransomware, detection, and prevention systems, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed global ransomware center also involves software engineering (cs.SE) and cybercrime (cs.CY). The use of sophisticated cryptographic techniques and the potential for using artificial intelligence (AI) to detect and prevent ransomware attacks also suggest the possibility of the paper belonging to the categories of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC).
